pr_title: GEODE-8489: "Select *" query by DistributedSystemMBean should not hon…

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a query that returns 0 results. And verify the results are shown as expected.
timeline.author: agingade

replies.bodyText: the test is to verify the results are formatted correctly. If returning 0 results, no formats needed, that's not the purpose of the tests. I am sure there are other tests that tests 0 results.
replies.author: jinmeiliao

timeline.message:
GEODE-8489: "Select *" query by DistributedSystemMBean should not honor jackson json annotations

* null value fields are serialized as well
* move QueryResultFormatterTest to core
